sources.name: sourceNames
sources.script:
source(output(
		acctnum as string,
		fullname as string,
		phone as string,
		zip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceNames

transformations.name: Orig
transformations.script:
FuzzyMatch select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue
	))~> Orig

transformations.name: Copy
transformations.script:
FuzzyMatch select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue
	))~> Copy

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
Aggregate1, Copy join(lastid == acctnum,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip
	))~> Select1
